channel.title: Preventative
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Preventative, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Cancer Doesn’t Care’: Citizen Lobbyists Unite To Push Past Washington’s Ugly Politics
